abstract: Vows column on wedding of Jennifer Downey and Robert Reid.
lead_paragraph: A divorced psychiatrist, wary of love, finds a man who sings gospel and changes her heart.

headline.main: Dr. Jennifer Downey and Robert Reid: Yes, They Can Get a Witness
headline.print_headline: Yes, They Can Get a Witness

snippet: A divorced psychiatrist, wary of love, finds a man who sings gospel and changes her heart.
